Verses: 1 baabilon Kumaaraththiyaagiya Kannigaiye, Nee Irangi Mannile Utkaaru; Kaldheyarin Kumaaraththiye, Tharaiyile Utkaaru; Unakku Singaasanamillai; Nee Serukkukkaariyum Sugaselviyum Endru Ini Azhaikkappaduvadhillai.
2 endhiraththai Eduththu Maavarai; Un Mukkaattai Neekkividu; Verunkaalum Ammanaththodaiyumaai Aarugalaik Kadandhupo.
3 un Nirvaanam Velippadum; Un Lachchai Kaanappadum; Naan Oruvanaiyum Paaraamal Needhiyai Sarikkattuven.
4 engal Meetparudaiya Naamam Isravelin Parisuththaraagiya Senaigaludaiya Karththar Enbadhu.
5 kaldheyarin Kumaaraththiye, Nee Andhagaaraththukkul Pravesiththu Mavunamaai Utkaaru; Ini Nee Raajyangalin Naayagiyendru Azhaikkappaduvadhillai.

6 naan En Janaththinmel Kadunkobamadaindhu, En Sudhandharaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakki, Avargalai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen; Nee Avargalmel Irakkamvaiyaamal, Mudhirvayadhullavargalinmel Un Nugaththai Magaa Baaramaakki,
7 endrendraikkum Naayagiyaayiruppenendru Solli, Indhak Kaariyangalai Idhuvaraikkum Un Manadhile Vaiyaamalum, Adhin Mudi
